message.body: So I think Jeff stood me up
This has never happened to me before
Yeah he got here and dumped me
Said the chemistry wasn't there
Iâ€™m so sorry cris. that is such a surprise!
You must have felt blind sighted
Yeah
I'm completely shocked.
I thought he really liked me but he said there was just something missing
I wish he wouldn't have told me he liked me and saw potential for something right before sleeping with me.
i know that feels really bad but if there is any consolation i really believe he meant it
Maybe. But we don't talk for a week then he tells me he only sees me as a friend?
I mean I sleep with someone a few times before chalking it up to lack of chemistry
40 minutes late doesn't even apologizes, just says there's no chemistry then leaves
I'm so disappointed in him. We could've talked the next day or something
He really broke my heart
Right before this he kissed me deeply and said he was leaving for a week but to not assume he was disappearing. I tried trusting him but that's exactly what happened.
I totally regret not asking him if there was anyone else

Sorry I haven't been responding. I've been prepping for the six minute presentation of my work I'm giving tonight. I really don't think there is somebody else. I may have some time to call you tomorrow. If not we can chat in Saturday but don't fret. All this stuff always works out for the best.
Yeah I'm ok. I'm just pissed because he seemed super into me, like planned all our dates for the rest of the month the day before he left.
Like he planned things. Not me
But whatever. And yeah we can talk
I know. Shit is weird. Sound like it wasn't anything you did or said but rather his change of heart. Maybe seeing family stirred too things.
Maybe. Maybe he will end up changing his mind but I'm not focused on it too much
Haven't contacted him or anything
Great!!!!
I shouldn't contact him at all right?
Omg no
Sorry I know you're busy
Ok!
Disappear
Seriously
No not get drunk and text
Seriously delete his number
I have it
I'm gone. Yeah I deleted his texts.
Ok phew
And pictures so I won't see him
Yeah you can contact on a month
But you will move in
On
By then
So it won't matter
But yes in four weeks you can contact
I have his number but I only dunk text when I see a text chat.
I won't
I'll be good!!
No less
He is shy but being aggressive will scare that man away.
Give him space
Unless he contacts me, I won't do anything period
Show that you respect him
Yes
Even after a month. I don't think I'd be interested in a friendship anyways so yeah I won't contact him
You will hard forgotten about this by then. I know it's hard to believe. But I'm confident
Nah I know I'm just saying I don't think I want a friendship. Maybe I'll be hard to forget though ;)
Of course. You know it!
